name: Antibiotic stewardship: co-amoxiclav, cephalosporins & quinolones (KTT9) prescribing volume
title: Antibiotic stewardship: co-amoxiclav, cephalosporins & quinolones (KTT9):
Number of prescription items for co-amoxiclav,
cephalosporins and quinolones per oral antibacterials (BNF 5.1 sub-set) item-based STAR-PU
description: Number of prescription items for co-amoxiclav,
why_it_matters: Co-amoxiclav, cephalosporins and quinolones are broad spectrum antibiotics that can
be used when others have failed. It is important that
they are used sparingly, to avoid drug-resistant bacteria
developing. This measure looks at the volume of these
prescribed, versus the list size adjusted for need.
numerator_where: (bnf_code LIKE '0501013K0%'  OR bnf_code LIKE '0501021%'  OR bnf_code LIKE '050112%')
